review.reviewBody: Other than the Spinach and Ricotta Cheese Cannelloni being small compared to their other pasta orders it's ABSOLUTELY DELICIOUS! Garlic bread is delicious (but way overpriced) The Caesar salad was yummy with authentic dressing.

Salad was delicious and fresh - easily enough for 2 people. The pasta Veneziana was spicy and the"full" portion was huge - fed 2 hungry adults dinner with enough for a good lunch tomorrow - highly recommend
Good portion of pasta per order. Totally worth the $$$. Tastes good too!!
delicious! just wish there was more sauce, was a little dry.
Food arrived hot. I was surprised at the size of the full order and I guess it is more family style orders. Food tastes great! I have dinner plus extra.
